extendedInfo.description: No more IOU for YOU.You can now pay people with the PopmoneyÂ® personal payment service. Weâve made paying someone and getting paid as easy as sending a text or email.The Popmoney Android app lets you easily send or request money from friends, family, or anyone at all.* All you need is their name and email address or mobile phone number  to move money  from your bank account to theirs.  The Popmoney app makes it easy to:* Pay your friends, family or other people using just their email address or mobile phone number. *  Request payment from a single person or a group of people, including setting up reminders to pay*  Pick up a Popmoney payment someone else has sent you and assure it lands in your designated bank or credit union account Popmoney is offered by 1400 financial institutions, making it easy for your friends, family and others to take advantage of the service. Use Popmoney to pay your landlord, your cousin, or your coworker.  Popmoney makes it easy to pay for all sorts of things - rent, shared bills, or even just paying back a friend for lunch. Itâs a simple, secure, and smarter way to pay and get paid.*Check out more info at Popmoney.com*Terms and Conditions apply.

reviews.comment: Rejected emergency money I was sending for no apparent reason.  They charge you fees.  The money cleared my regular bank account,  but still no money sent. Shady fly by night company. Don\'t use.
reviews.author: Darren Leclerc

reviews.title: Wouldn\'t work + fees
reviews.comment: It wouldn\'t work unless I have a debit card. I don\'t have a debit card, just an ATM.  Went on line and discovered that to send money using the app would cost $0.95. Through my bank it\'s $0.00.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not what I expected
reviews.comment: Cant log in using my bank as cridentials. Costs money to send.  No thanks. I\'ll just log into my bank instead.
reviews.author: John Vo

reviews.title: I <3 Popmoney
reviews.comment: Been using popmoney both online and on my droid since March of this year, mostly to receive money from my dad who lives in a different state. I use a rush card for receiving money. You dont need a bank account.  Just use the direct deposit information :)
reviews.author: Calais Conerly

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Worked flawlessly. An excellent addition to banking with just about all banks involved! Even my credit union.
reviews.author: No I don\'t

reviews.title: No no no no no
reviews.comment: 6 days to complete a transfer? Used once, never will again. Faster to mail funds using USPS. NOT RECOMMENDED
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Contacts don\'t sync
reviews.comment: So let me get this straight... I went to all the trouble of setting up an account on the web, have made several payments to individuals, yet I can\'t make the same payments on the app? I have to go through the torture of setting up their accounts AGAIN? I think not. Lame. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Becca Parks

reviews.title: Useless app
reviews.comment: I signed up on the app and got a welcome email that said a verification code would be sent. None was sent. I tried to accept a payment but with no code, its useless. Tapping Resend Code only gave me an error message. After 2 hours, I signed up using a computer. There were security questions?! Why didn\'t I answer those when signing up with the app? After I added my checking account and tried to accept the payment, it says, \"User not a legitimate receiver for this transaction.\"Pointless company. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Judy T

reviews.title: Crappy App
reviews.comment: I had a customer try to pay an invoice through this service...what a nightmare! The app kept asking for a password that met the criteria even though I had included the correct characters. Then after about an hour of trying to set up the account, the account was locked out....son of a bi$#!. I called customer service and they were very responsive, however all I wanted was my damned money. They told me I entered the wrong damned information and had to start over....CRAP! Please save yourself some time and use
reviews.author: Brian McDaniel

reviews.comment: Is not allowing valid password creations for new accounts so does not work for my android phone.
reviews.author: Anna Henry

reviews.comment: Very fast, love it
reviews.author: Randy Sarjeant

reviews.title: Very poor!!!
reviews.comment: It won\'t let me log in. Keeps telling me I entered the wong email address or password. I can log in using the pc not the app. Plz fix it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app good service.
reviews.comment: It\'s only a $0.95 fee to send money. Cheaper than gas and the time spent at the ATM etc. Probably not the best idea to request 1 dollar from someone. That\'s just common sense.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unimpressed!
reviews.comment: It took a week and a half to get my money. They said it would be 3 business days. Mail would have been faster!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Password doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I set up pop money through my regular banking website, and never had to enter a password. Yet my bank site password doesn\'t get me in. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Emily Pfeifer

reviews.title: Fees all over!!!
reviews.comment: Wow... so I requested a $1.00 from my friend... and after all the fees I only received .05 cents!! You\'ve got to be kidding me right!?! Unbelievable ... use Chase QuickPay for free when you request a dollar guess what you get paid a dollar, go figure...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great alternative to paypaly or debit card machine.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is pretty neat, and great for paycards without routing and accnt # info. Transfers are super fast too!
reviews.author: Samantha Liberal

reviews.title: Too watered down.
reviews.comment: This app is pretty limited. No direct deposit option, no xfer from checking acct only debit card, no resend option from history, etc... Could keep going, but I have wasted enough of my time on this poorly developed app.
reviews.author: Eddie Garcia

reviews.title: Fail!
reviews.comment: The sign-up screen won\'t take my password (it says that the password does not meet the requirements) even though it meets all the requirements. Not very promising.
reviews.author: Thierry Fernaine
